Posts.EditableText: In the QDK Tutorial manual, should all the terms making a reference to "Change/add" actually be read as "Modify"?
Posts.HTML: In the QDK Tutorial manual, should all the terms making a reference to "Change/add" actually be read as "Modify"?

Posts.EditableText: Yes, thanks for bringing this to my attention. Some of the script commands were renamed while Quest 4.0 was in beta, and the tutorial has not been updated to reflect this. I will correct this for the next version.
Posts.HTML: Yes, thanks for bringing this to my attention. Some of the script commands were renamed while Quest 4.0 was in beta, and the tutorial has not been updated to reflect this. I will correct this for the next version.
